BR1.Summary: The language of the page on the Login and Registration pages does not change
BR1.Pre-conditions: Open the site https://exe.ua/,The user must not be logged in

Steps.st2: Click on the button 'Ukr' t in the upper right part of the page
Steps.st3: Click on the button 'Eng' in the upper right part of the page
Steps.st4: Click on the button 'registration' in the upper right part of the page
Steps.st6: Click on the button 'Ukr' in the upper right part of the page
Steps.st7: Click on the button 'Eng' in the upper right part of the page

BR1.Expected_result: The page must be translated into the appropriate language
BR1.Actual_result: Changing the localization does not work
